synopsis.text: Kodama and Amano's 11-year-old son, Keisuke, is a skeptic who dismisses the existence of supernatural entities like ghosts, UFOs, and youkai. When he notices his older sister, Natsume, frequently returning home late, his curiosity piques, leading him to follow her one day. To his surprise, he uncovers Natsume's secret involvement with a youkai detective agency, where she works alongside her friends Touma and Akinori to combat evil Youkai and solve Youkai-related crimes. With their secret out, Natsume reluctantly allows Keisuke to join them in their thrilling adventures to maintain peace in the city. Set after the fourth movie, this series invites viewers to join the Amano siblings on their exciting journey into the world of the supernatural.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
